description.english: Enter the Overworld for the first time
Use the open steam pipe to shrink yourself
Use water leak to grow back to normal size

displayName.english: Is Your Name Lightning McQueen? Because You Are Speed!

description.english: Complete the game within 2 hours on Spicy mode

displayName.english: Is What's On The Other Side Not Good Enough For You Or Something?
The 80's Called, They Want Their Song Back

description.english: Leave Viola to scream for thirty seconds

displayName.english: The Beginnings Of A Decent Brunch

description.english: Have Bolly trim the vines in the Grasslands
Have Angel remove the blocks of ice from the Snowcaps
Have Lepiota remove the lavafalls in the Volcano
Meet Viola and Lila in Level 40
Have Lila open the doors in the Castle
Finally sit down and have dinner with everyone
Complete the game within 2 hours on Cosy mode
Complete the game within 2 hours on Hell mode

displayName.english: No Dinner, No Reunion, Just Tears
Breaking News! Cosy Mushroom Avoids Death
